overview:
Evan Carothers is a software engineer with a passion for design and development. Evan graduated with a BS in Computer Science and Information Systems from the University of Wisconsin - River Falls in 2008. Since then he has worked on developing workforce management and scheduling software for the public safety sector, integrated web video/audio/text chat solutions, presence broadcasting software, and many other diverse projects.

Evan’s true passion lies in health and fitness, and he founded FitBolt, the workday health and wellness platform to help people who sit at a desk all day, just like him, to stay health, happy, and fit through the workday.
